mapper.insert: insert into `order` (user_id, order_no, shipping_id, payment, payment_type, postage, status, payment_time, send_time, end_time, close_time, create_time, update_time) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderNo}, #{shippingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payment,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{paymentType}, #{postage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), now(), now(),now(), now(), now())
mapper.update: update `order` set status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, send_time =now(), update_time = now() where order_no = #{orderNo}

update `order` set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, shipping_id = #{shippingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, payment = #{payment,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, payment_type = #{paymentType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, postage = #{postage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, payment_time = now(), send_time =now(), update_time = now() where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, order_no, shipping_id, payment, payment_type, postage, status, payment_time, send_time, end_time, close_time, create_time, update_time from order where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, user_id, order_no, shipping_id, payment, payment_type, postage, status, payment_time, send_time, end_time, close_time, create_time, update_time from order
select id, user_id, order_no, shipping_id, payment, payment_type, postage, status, payment_time, send_time, end_time, close_time, create_time, update_time from `order` where user_id=#{userId}
select id, user_id, order_no, shipping_id, payment, payment_type, postage, status, payment_time, send_time, end_time, close_time, create_time, update_time from `order` where order_no=#{orderNo}
